Name

SnapshotGetParent

Description

($err, $parentSnapshotHandle) = SnapshotGetParent($snapshotHandle);

This function returns the parent of a snapshot.

Parameters

snapshotHandle
A snapshot handle.

Return Value

$err. The error code returned by the operation. For returned values, see Topics > Error Codes.

$parentSnapshotHandle. A handle to the parent of the specified snapshot.

Remarks

  • If you pass a root snapshot handle as the first parameter, then this function will return VIX_OK and set parentSnapshotHandle to VIX_INVALID_HANDLE.
  • This function is not supported when using the VIX_SERVICEPROVIDER_VMWARE_PLAYER host type.

Side Effects

None.

Requirements

use VMware::Vix::Simple;
use VMware::Vix::API::Constants;
since VMware Workstation 6.0
